Uses of Point2D in scene
 

Methods in scene that return Point2D
 Point2D Scene.parametrize(IPoint3D point3d)
          Returns the 2D point which maps the given 3D point to a texture (or checkers pattern).

Uses of Point2D in vectors
 

Methods in vectors that return Point2D
 Point2D Point2D.normalize()
          Returns a normalized point of this point (does not change this point).
